Precinct 3- Terence McDavid
===========================

![pct 3 ](https://storage.googleapis.com/proudcity/marlintx/2025/05/doc03254820250515094828_0001-scaled-e1747324270528-662x1024.jpg)

Hon. Terence McDavid was elected into office in May of 2025.
